title: Flex To Participate In Upcoming Investor Conferences
text: Flex To Participate In Upcoming Investor Conferences   Flex To Participate In Upcoming Investor Conferences -- SAN JOSE, Calif.  New Flex Logo. New Flex Logo.  ><- stripped tags -> SAN JOSE, Calif.   Flex (NASDAQ: [[]]) announced today that it will participate in the following events during the month of September. Live webcasts of all three conferences will be available on the Investor Relations section of the Flex website at: [[]]. 2015 Citi Global Technology Conference Date: September 9, 2015 Presentation time: 12:30pm PT / 3:30pm ET Presenters: Flex Management Team 2015 Deutsche Bank Technology Conference Date: September 16, 2015 Presentation time: 2:00pm PT / 5:00pm ET Presenters: Flex Management Team
